tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_cases (
    case_id INT,
    victim_name VARCHAR(50),
    bully_name VARCHAR(50),
    incident_date DATE,
    evidence TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  bully_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  incident_date DATE,
  evidence TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE law_enforcement_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  jurisdiction VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_description TEXT,
    case_date DATE,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_team (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_lead VARCHAR(50),
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE case_notes (
    note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    note_date DATETIME,
    note TEXT,
    investigator VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CyberbullyingCases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_name VARCHAR(100),
    perpetrator_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InvestigationTeam (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(100),
    lead_investigator VARCHAR(100),
    investigator_count INT,
    case_id INT REFERENCES CyberbullyingCases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Evidence (
    evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT REFERENCES CyberbullyingCases(case_id),
    evidence_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InvestigationReport (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT REFERENCES CyberbullyingCases(case_id),
    report_text TEXT,
    report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE cyberbullying_cases (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_description TEXT,
    reported_by TEXT,
    report_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resolution_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE suspect_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    ip_address INET,
    last_access TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE evidence_data (
    evidence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id UUID,
    data_type TEXT,
    data_location TEXT,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_team (
    team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name TEXT,
    team_lead TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    team_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
);
